autumn.lang.compiler.ast.literals

Class BigDecimalLiteral

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.lang.compiler.ast.literals.AbstractNumericLiteral<java.math.BigDecimal>
      • autumn.lang.compiler.ast.literals.BigDecimalLiteral

  • public final class BigDecimalLiteral
extends AbstractNumericLiteral<java.math.BigDecimal>
    An instance of this class represents a double literal.

      • value

        public java.math.BigDecimal value()
        This method converts this literal to its numeric equivalent.
        Specified by:
        value in class AbstractNumericLiteral<java.math.BigDecimal>

      • isParsable

        public boolean isParsable()
        This method determines whether this literal would be recognized by the parser.

        Note: Under some circumstances, a literal may be malformed and parse-able.

        Specified by:
        isParsable in class AbstractNumericLiteral<java.math.BigDecimal>
        Returns:
        true, iff the parser would recognize this literal.
